directions: Mix lemon yogurt and whipped dessert topping together in a large bowl. Fold blueberries, raspberries, and blackberries into the yogurt mixture; pour into prepared pie crust.
Refrigerate until the mixture sets, about 4 hours.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) container extra-creamy whipped dessert topping
1 (9 inch) prepared deep dish graham cracker pie crust
title: Todd and Jenny's Favorite Summertime Fluff Pie
